name: Disable Windows 10 Tracking, version 3.1.2
body:
This version of Disable Windows 10 Tracking pretty much fixes like, everything. I think?

# Instructions
1. Download dwt-x.x-cp27-win_x86.zip below
2. Extract the files in any directory.
3. Right click on `DisableWinTracking.exe` and press `Run as administrataor`
4. Choose any/all of the options you'd like
5. Select either "Privacy" to enable the tweaks, or "Revert" to revert them.
6. You can read the output in the console dialog to see if it worked.
7. That's it!

You can read the license at Info>About

### RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR!

I cannot stress this enough, not running the program as an administrator will result in none of the tweaks being applied.

### Changes since v3.1.1
- Fixed #320 

Have fun!

name: Disable Windows 10 Tracking, version 3.1.0
body:
This version of Disable Windows 10 Tracking pretty much fixes like, everything. I think?

# Instructions
1. Download dwt-x.x-cp27-win_x86.zip below
2. Extract the files in any directory.
3. Right click on `DisableWinTracking.exe` and press `Run as administrataor`
4. Choose any/all of the options you'd like
5. Select either "Privacy" to enable the tweaks, or "Revert" to revert them.
6. You can read the output in the console dialog to see if it worked.
7. That's it!

You can read the license at Info>About

### RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR!

I cannot stress this enough, not running the program as an administrator will result in none of the tweaks being applied.

### Changes since v3.0.1
- [x] added `-silent` argument to just run all available options with logging
- [x] removed (commented out) section of program for app uninstall/reinstall. resized form. it's totally broken.
- [x] removed windows defender option for now. it's totally broken. thank microsoft for protecting the keys
- [x] fixed DiagTrack option with code rewrite. it's ugly, but it works. tried to fix original first.

Have fun!

name: Disable Windows 10 Tracking, version 3.0.1
body:
This version of Disable Windows 10 Tracking pretty much fixes like, everything. I think?

# Instructions
1. Download dwt-x.x-cp27-win_x86.zip below
2. Extract the files in any directory.
3. Right click on `DisableWinTracking.exe` and press `Run as administrataor`
4. Choose any/all of the options you'd like
5. Select either "Privacy" to enable the tweaks, or "Revert" to revert them.
6. You can read the output in the console dialog to see if it worked.
7. That's it!

You can read the license at Info>About

### RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR!

I cannot stress this enough, not running the program as an administrator will result in none of the tweaks being applied.

### Changes since v3.0
- Reverted to Python 2 to fix PyInstaller errors like this one:
  - Fixed `Failed to execute script dwt` on some systems. [untested]
- Fixed WindowsError `The handle is invalid`.
- Added "Sway" to list of uninstallable apps.
- File size reduced from ~9 MB to ~6 MB.

Have fun!

name: Disable Windows 10 Tracking
body:
**_PRE-RELEASE: Not tested thoroughly.**_
**_EVERYTHING IS BROKEN DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS DAMMIT**_

# Instructions
1. Download dwt-x.x-cp35-win_x86.zip below
2. Extract the files in any directory.
3. Right click on `DisableWinTracking.exe` and press `Run as administrataor`
4. Choose any/all of the options you'd like
5. Select either "Privacy" to enable the tweaks, or "Revert" to revert them.
6. You can read the output in the console dialog to see if it worked.
7. That's it!

You can read the license at Info>About

### RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR!

I cannot stress this enough, not running the program as an administrator will result in none of the tweaks being applied.

### Changes since v2.5.1
- Everything rewritten! Many things borrowed from my other program, pyjam.
- Split Windows Defender and WifiSense into two options
- GUI should now scale properly (hopefully)
- Everything is less terrible!
- Code is somewhat cleaner!
- Fixed DiagTrack service
- Settings now works completely
- Added license list
- Updated copyright year
- License changed to GPLv3
- Loads of bugs fixed.

Have fun!

name: Disable Windows 10 Tracking
body:
GitHub, I released this on 9/21/15 not 9/9/15!

# Instructions
1. Download DisableWinTracking.exe below
2. Open it. It should request for administrator privileges.
3. Choose any/all of the options you'd like
4. Press "Get privacy!"
5. You can read the output in the console dialog to see if it worked.

name: Disable Windows 10 Tracking (BROKEN)
body:
## This is a test version, do not download unless you acknowledge that this has not been tested very much.

Do NOT use older versions in an attempt to gain back functionality. There's a REASON (it's broken) it was removed/temporarily disabled and we won't support it.

# Instructions
1. Download DisableWinTracking.exe below
2. Open it. It should request for administrator privileges.
3. Choose any/all of the options you'd like
4. Press "Get privacy!"
5. You can read the output in the console dialog to see if it worked.
6. That's it!

# If you ever need to revert
1. Download DisableWinTracking.exe below

### Changes since v2.3
- Option to disable Windows Defender and Wifi Sense data collection by @Ruined1 
- Optimizations by both me and @Ruined1 
- Fixed "AllowTelemetry" being set as a string instead of a DWORD ( @zy26 )
- Finally changed the exe manifest to automatically request Administrator privileges.
- Logging! If an error occurs, DisableWinTracking.log will contain detailed information about the error so we (the developers) can help you fix it.

Have fun!

name: Disable Windows 10 Tracking
body:
This version includes a fix for errors with Skype and Mail. To apply the fix, open the program and press the "Fix Skype/Mail" button.

# Instructions
1. Download run.exe below
2. Right click on 'run.exe' and press "Run as Administrator"
3. Choose any/all of the options you'd like
4. Press "Get privacy!"
5. You can read the output in the console dialog to see if it worked.
6. That's it!

# If you ever need to revert
1. Download run.exe below
2. Right click on 'run.exe' and press "Run as Administrator"
3. Choose any/all of the options you'd like
4. Press "Revert"
5. You can read the output in the console dialog to see if it worked.
6. That's it!

You can read the license at Info>About

### RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR!

I cannot stress this enough, not running the program as an administrator will result in none of the tweaks being applied.

### Changes since v2.2.1
- OneDrive uninstallation support!
- Fixed Skype and Mail not working properly. To apply the fix, open the program and press the "Fix Skype/Mail" button.

Have fun!

name: Disable Windows 10 Tracking
body:
# Instructions
1. Download run.exe below
2. Right click on 'run.exe' and press "Run as Administrator"
3. Choose any/all of the options you'd like
4. Press "Go Private!"
5. You can read the output at the bottom to see if it worked.
6. That's it!

You can read the license at Info>About

### RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR!

I cannot stress this enough, not running the program as an administrator will result in none of the tweaks being applied.

### Changes since v1.5
- Rewritten
- Smaller file; dropped from ~9 MB to ~6.7 MB (UPX)
- Split HOSTS mod option into 2 options, one for normal users and another for the extra paranoid. (Suggested by @simplypeachy.)
- Fixed DiagTrack log not being cleared properly (Thanks, @a-iv!)
- Fixed HOSTS file becoming a mess (Screw you, CRLF!)
- Fixed type in one of the domains (Thanks, @simplypeachy!)
- Rename to Disable Windows 10 Tracking from Windows Tracking Disable Tool
